column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We only had about a 20 minute wait at peak dinner time
column2: a few days before Christmas. The only bummer was that I couldn't put my name on the list until my friend arrived
column3: even though he was only a few minutes away. I get it
column4: but wish they could be more flexible with this rule. If they call me and my friend isn't there yet
column5: why not just move onto the next person? Either way
